text: @SenWarren YOU should be talking to Andrew Cuomo who sent people with the coronavirus into nursing homes who is responsible for all those elderly people's deaths! These are the people who could have been saved if Cuomo wasn't so FREAKING STUPID MORON! Want to talk about him & what he did?
